column1: GET MORE MONEY*Tap the icon indicated by the arrow to*increase money production speed!*＠*GET MORE MONEY*The capacity of the wallet also increases*And you can have a clear advantage!*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*
PRODUCE CATS*Now let’s produce some cats!*Tap the icon below!*＠*PRODUCE CATS*Cats attack the enemy’s castle automatically!*Save money and produce cats on and on!*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*
Fire the Cat Cannon!*It is loaded when the icon is shown.*First lure the enemies and then fire!*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*
Change units!*When you have more than 6 kinds of cats
column2: *you can choose them by*flicking like this.*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*

column1: Do you believe in God-Cat?*Tap the button above to get help!*Do believe in miracles!*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*
Use items efficiently!*These are the itmes currently in use!*Tap the icon to*change it unable/enable.*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*
Equip cats 1.*Hold a cat icon you want to use and*bring it to the slot above!*＠*Equip cats 2*Hold an icon in a slot to sort cats and*remove from slots to unequip.!*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*
How to use items*Tap the item icon you want to use!*Note: Please choose before battle begins.*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*
About Cat Food 1*Cat Food is a special point you can purchase.*＠*＠*About Cat Food 2*Tap the +icon below to purchase Cat Food.*Note:Network is required.*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*
The first advent campaign!*You need Cat Food to get his help normally
column2: *But It's FREE this time!*Now tap the icon!*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*＠*
